GovernanceCreated(address,address,addres.details: Event emitted when the governance system has been successfully created

params.owner_: Address of the owner, will be Celo governance

createGovernance(address,address,bytes32.details: Can only be called by the owner and only once

params.additionalAllocationRecipients: Additional addresses to receive an initial token allocation.        Airgrab, and Governance Timelock are automatically added as recipients to the End.
params.airgrabRoot: Root hash for the airgrab Merkle tree
params.allocationAmounts: percentage amount of tokens to be allocated to the allocation recipients        can be 0 to skip allocation to a hardcoded recipient
params.celoCommunityFund_: Address of the Celo community fund that will receive the unclaimed airgrab tokens
params.watchdogMultiSig_: Address of the Mento community's multisig wallet with the veto rights

owner().details: Returns the address of the current owner.

renounceOwnership().details: Leaves the contract without owner. It will not be possible to call `onlyOwner` functions anymore. Can only be called by the current owner. NOTE: Renouncing ownership will leave the contract without an owner, thereby removing any functionality that is only available to the owner.

transferOwnership(address).details: Transfers ownership of the contract to a new account (`newOwner`). Can only be called by the current owner.

constructor.notice: Creates the factory contract with the owner address

createGovernance(address,address,bytes32.notice: Creates and initializes the governance system contracts

userdoc.notice: Factory for creating and initializing the entire governance system including the MENTO token, locking, emission, airgrab, and governance-related contracts.*
